bibl.title: Catalogue of the Greek and Latin Papyri in the John Rylands Library, Manchester. Vol. III: Theological and Literary Texts (Nos 457-551)
bibl.seg: Roberts Colin H., Catalogue of the Greek and Latin Papyri in the John Rylands Library, Manchester. Vol. III: Theological and Literary Texts (Nos 457-551).
Manchester, Manchester University Press, 1938, 4°, xvii-217 pp. et 10 pll.

C.R. par A. Baumstark, OC 36 (1939) pp. 126-132. - Pierre Benoît, RBibl 48 (1939) pp. 112-115. - Aristide Calderini, Aegyptus 18 (1938) pp. 349-350. - Marcel Hombert, ChrEg 14 (1939) No. 27, pp. 174-178. - Frederic G. Kenyon, JThS 40 (1939) pp. 180-182. - Charles Martin, NRTh 66 (1939) pp. 879-881. - W.A. Oldfather, AJP 61 (1940) pp. 211-221. - Bruno Snell, Gnomon 15 (1939) pp. 529-543 (concerne aussi P. Mil. Vogl. I). - A. Souter, BRL 22 (1938) pp. 339-342. - Eric G. Turner, JHS 59 (1939) p. 161. - W.G. Waddell, CR 52 (1938) p. 229. - M. Zerwich, Orientalia N.S., 8 (1939) pp. 191-194.
